documentation.text: @notice Allows any potential freelancer to submit their application details (via IPFS CID).
@notice Allows the employer to assign a freelancer to an open, escrowed job.
@notice Allows the assigned freelancer to mark work as completed (ready for approval).
@notice Allows the employer to release escrowed payment after work submission.
@notice Allows the employer to get a refund for an OPEN job after a delay.

devdoc.details: Handles job postings, applications (via events), assignment, escrow, work submission, payment, refunds, disputes, deletion, and withdrawal. Descriptions and Application Details stored off-chain (IPFS CIDs).

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: JobBoard

assignJob(uint256,address).notice: Allows the employer to assign a freelancer to an open, escrowed job.

deleteJob(uint256).notice: Allows the employer to delete an OPEN job, refunding escrow if present.

escrowFunds(uint256).notice: Allows the employer to escrow the payment for an open job.

markWorkDone(uint256).notice: Allows the assigned freelancer to mark work as completed (ready for approval).

postJob(string,string,uint256).notice: Allows anyone to post a new job.

raiseDispute(uint256).notice: Allows employer or freelancer to raise a dispute on ASSIGNED or AWAITING_APPROVAL jobs.

refundEmployer(uint256).notice: Allows the employer to get a refund for an OPEN job after a delay.

releasePayment(uint256).notice: Allows the employer to release escrowed payment after work submission.

resolveDispute(uint256,bool).notice: Allows the contract owner (admin) to resolve a dispute.

submitApplication(uint256,string).notice: Allows any potential freelancer to submit their application details (via IPFS CID).

withdrawApplication(uint256).notice: Allows the assigned freelancer to withdraw their application (unassign).
